name: Deity Empires
description: Deity Empires is a 4X, turn-based strategy game with a powerful “just one more turn” feel! Enter an intricate fantasy world as one of many deities posed to become ruler of the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7.1 Service Pack 1 or later, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Ghz DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7.1 Service Pack 1 or later, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 Ghz DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
